roles.title: diplomat
quotes: Mary Chinery-Hesse, FAAS, OSG, née Blay (dem born am 29 October 1938) be international civil servant den diplomat wey dey serve as de first woman Chancellor give University of Ghana, wey dem induct am for 1 August 2018.
Place dem born am Accra
Na Robert Samuel Blay, a barrister, jurist, den Justice of de Supreme Court of Ghana during de First Republic wey born Mary Blay. Na ein mommie be Marjorie Lady Mould of Jamestown, Accra.
Residence Accra
Na ein maternal great-grand poppie be John van der Puije, de Gold Coast merchant, newspaper publisher, traditional ruler den politician.
